summary: Provides a Git‑based implementation of the Knowledge Repository interface, handling repository creation, initialization, path resolution, revision and branch management, content read/write operations, diff generation, publishing/unpublishing of assets, and synchronization with remote Git servers.
business_intent: Facilitate version‑controlled, collaborative storage and management of knowledge assets by leveraging Git, allowing teams to track changes, work on branches, publish content, and keep repositories in sync across remote locations within the Knowledge Repo platform.
